entry.string: UC - Unit Cost, BTUP - Before Tax Unit Price.

Due date is an independent input subject to how urgent the ordered goods is needed. If Unit Price includes tax, discount is ignored.
Depending on tax rate setting, [copy] may not retain the tax figure from source so. If assembly/package is not to be exploded, choose it from the normal Product/Parts or Services sections of the item list.
Manual tax input is allowed. However, inaccurate tax may be construed as an attempt to evade tax.
